company.name: Relego AI Solutions
company.description: Cutting-edge technology company specializing in AI-driven solutions for businesses
company.mission: Transforming businesses through intelligent automation and AI innovation

services.name: AI Development
services.description: Custom AI agents, machine learning models, and generative AI solutions

faqs.question: What industries do you serve?
faqs.answer: We serve businesses across all industries, with particular expertise in healthcare, finance, e-commerce, and technology sectors.

faqs.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide free initial consultations to understand your requirements and recommend the best solutions.

faqs.question: What is your typical project timeline?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. Simple automation projects can be completed in 2-4 weeks, while complex AI implementations may take 2-6 months.
